document.full_text: a change of diet has played a major role in novak djokovic's unbeaten run this year, the world number two said monday after receiving a hero's welcome from fans in his home town.
document.title: feast of titles is largely down to diet change: djokovic
lines_and_colors: a change of diet has played a major role in novak djokovic's unbeaten run this year, the world number two said monday after receiving a hero's welcome from fans in his home town.
